name: Fish Duel
description: Fish duel is an IO game which involves fish battling beneath the sea, where you can revel in the delight of biting and tearing up your opponents, and evolve your fish to dominate the ocean. Fancy a simple yet exciting casual game? This one is sure to get you and your friends hooked.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp，Vista，7 Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000) DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection
